explains: n. 锁柜，寄物柜；<美>冷藏间；锁具；（衣服、杂物、器械、军火的）存放室，箱

sentences.en: In the locker room, Amanda changed quickly.
sentences.cn: 在更衣室里，阿曼达快速地换好了衣服。

sentences.en: A woman reporter complained one of them sexually harassed her in the locker room.
sentences.cn: 一名女记者抱怨说，他们当中的一个在更衣室里对她进行了性骚扰。

sentences.en: The fresh food locker contains tortillas, fresh bread, breakfast rolls, and fresh fruits and vegetables.
sentences.cn: 这个新食品柜装着玉米粉圆饼、鲜面包、早餐卷、新鲜水果和蔬菜。
